title: Rambles in Europe ... With historical facts relating to Scotch-American families, gathered in Scotland and the North of Ireland ... Illustrated
author: Morrison, Leonard Allison.
snippet: The steeple, three sides of which are built of limestone, the fourth of red stone, is 120 feet high. The Shandon bells are no more musical than many others, but Rev. Francis Mahoney has made them immortal. By his sweet lines he has thrown around them a glamour, and made their music celebrated the world over.
